title: black screen on pixel 4 XL
content:
I purchased my Pixel 4 XL earlier this year in the States through google store. Today the screen would start turning into green and become unresponsive. Now it won't even startup. When I hold down the power button, it would just create a short vibration as feedback.

Is there anything I can do about it? I tried to hold it down for 30 seconds for a hard reset, but it didn't work. 

Please advise what can be done. 

PS I have updated the OS recently, not sure if that matters.
